name: Vicious Edge
description:
Character deals +1 DMG.
If there is more than 1 stack of this effect, each stack will increase DMG by 1 instead. (Max 3 stacks.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Character deals +1 DMG</color>.\nIf there is more than 1 stack of this effect, each stack will increase DMG by 1 instead. (Max 3 stacks.)
